description: Erection of new entrance lobby extension featuring clock tower, new entrance to infants building and single storey extensions to infant and juniors buildings.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  Prior to any development taking place the applicant or developer must submit details to the satisfaction of the Council regarding the following:

i)   Surveys to ensure that existing services are not present below and near to the new planting position, as  specified on drawing number 846/010/6, and are therefore likely to prevent satisfactory root development and/or become damaged by the new tree.

ii)   Details of the nature of the use of the ground immediately adjacent to the new planting position, both current and in the future.

ii)   Details of existing surfaces where the new planting position is proposed (as specified on drawing number 846/010/6), and how these surfaces are to be altered/modified/changed if necessary to accommodate the tree and its future requirements.

iv)   Design of the planting pit to ensure that there is adequate soil depth of sufficient organic matter content to ensure satisfactory growth.

v)   Design of protective surfaces immediately adjacent to the base of tree and also methods of staking to secure the tree in the first years post planting.  In addition, details are required regarding how above ground damage will be prevented due to vehicles and vandalism etc.

vi)     Details of post planting care and establishment including watering.

REASON:  To ensure that the health and stability of the replacement tree is protected on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
